death_text: m_c was murdered. The culprit is unknown.

death_text: m_c was found dead near a fox den.

death_text: m_c was bitten by a snake, and succumbed to the venom.

history_text.reg_death: m_c was killed by a snake.

death_text: m_c saved a kit from a snake, but was bitten in the process. The venom killed {PRONOUN/m_c/object}.

history_text.reg_death: m_c was killed by a snake, while saving a kit.

death_text: m_c went missing, and was found dead out in the territory.

history_text.reg_death: m_c went missing, and was found dead.

death_text: m_c was found dead near the o_c border.

history_text.reg_death: m_c was found dead near the o_c border.

death_text: o_c attempted to break into the camp. m_c and r_r are left cold on the ground in the aftermath.

history_text.reg_death: This rabbit died when o_c tried to break into camp.
history_text.lead_death: tried to defend the Clan from o_c

death_text: o_c attempted to break into the camp. m_c died defending the nursery, r_r huddled beneath {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} cooling body.

history_text.reg_death: m_c died defending r_r from o_c warriors.

death_text: m_c was burnt alive while trying to save r_r from a fire.

history_text.reg_death: m_c was killed in a fire while trying to save r_r.

history_text.reg_death: m_c died from infected wounds.

death_text: m_c and r_r die from eating tainted prey.

history_text.reg_death: m_c died from eating tainted prey.

death_text: m_c fell into the river and r_r drowned alongside m_c while trying to rescue {PRONOUN/m_c/object}.

history_text.reg_death: m_c drowned alongside a Clanmate.

death_text: m_c and r_r are killed by a gang of rogues.

death_text: r_r and m_c die of greencough.

death_text: r_r and m_c die of yellowcough.

death_text: A bad case of greencough strikes the Clan, taking r_r and m_c's lives.

history_text.reg_death: m_c died of greencough.

death_text: m_c has always wondered where {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} came from. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/sneak/sneaks} out of camp, intending to find loners who might have some clues about {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} origins. Frantic with worry and confusion after finding m_c's empty nest in the morning, c_n launches a search. They find {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} cooling body after a long search and wonders why {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} decided to leave the safety of c_n, and what killed {PRONOUN/m_c/object}.

history_text.reg_death: Curiosity killed this rabbit.
history_text.lead_death: lost a life because of curiosity.

death_text: m_c sacrificed {PRONOUN/m_c/self} for r_r in a battle with o_c.

history_text.reg_death: m_c sacrificed {PRONOUN/m_c/self} for r_r in battle.

death_text: m_c threw {PRONOUN/m_c/self} in front of an oncoming attack meant for r_r, taking the deadly blow instead.

history_text.reg_death: m_c sacrificed {PRONOUN/m_c/self} for r_r in battle.

death_text: m_c intentionally stayed behind and fought a losing battle to give r_r time to escape.

history_text.reg_death: m_c sacrificed {PRONOUN/m_c/self} for r_r in battle.

death_text: When traveling together near the border of c_n territory, m_c used {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} own body to shield r_r from a surprise o_c ambush, even though it meant certain death.

history_text.reg_death: m_c sacrificed {PRONOUN/m_c/self} for r_r in an ambush.
history_text.lead_death: sacrificed {PRONOUN/m_c/self} for r_r in an ambush.

death_text: m_c sacrificed {PRONOUN/m_c/self} by taking on the role of a messenger, delivering important information that could save {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} Clan. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/were/was} killed while investigating enemy territory.

death_text: m_c drowned in a river while trying to escape from a sudden o_c attack.

history_text.reg_death: m_c drowned in a river attempting to escape an enemy attack.
history_text.lead_death: drowned in a river attempting to escape an enemy attack.

death_text: m_c fell into a pit trap set by o_c's warriors.

history_text.lead_death: fell into a pit trap set by an enemy Clan.

death_text: m_c was hit by a monster while escaping across a Thunderpath from o_c warriors.

history_text.reg_death: m_c was hit by a monster.

death_text: m_c wandered out into the territory, and was later found dead, a peaceful expression on {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} face.

history_text.reg_death: m_c died of old age.

death_text: m_c was found stiff and curled up in {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} nest.  It seems {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} died in {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} sleep.

history_text.reg_death: m_c died of old age.

death_text: m_c faded more and more as the days went by, until one day, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/were/was} found dead in {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} nest.

history_text.reg_death: m_c died of old age.

death_text: m_c is suddenly struck by a sharp pain in {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} chest. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/are/is} found later that day, cold.

history_text.reg_death: m_c died of a heart attack.

death_text: m_c and r_r loved each other so much they could not be parted, even by death. c_n finds their bodies still wrapped around each other in the morning.

history_text.reg_death: This rabbit died from old age life.
history_text.lead_death: lost all remaining lives from old age.
